definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="13" y="-148"><field name="trigger">No additional trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"/><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops" inline="false"><field name="OP">OR</field><value name="A"><block type="logic_entity_compare"><field name="entity">EntityPlayer</field><value name="compareTo"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="logic_entity_compare"><field name="entity">EntityPlayerMP</field><value name="compareTo"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="spawn_particle_multi"><field name="particle">SMOKE_NORMAL</field><value name="count"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><value name="dx"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">3</field></block></value><value name="dy"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">3</field></block></value><value name="dz"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">3</field></block></value><value name="speed"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="explode"><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><value name="power"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">3</field></block></value><next><block type="block_remove"><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
